Authors: Madyatmadja E.D., Putri A.S., Hiqna S.S., Pratita W.
Title: Data dashboard for decision support systems for intrapreneurship in a company
Source title: Advances in Science, Technology and Engineering Systems
Affiliations: Information Systems Department, School of Information Systems, Bina Nusantara University11480, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Madyatmadja, E.D., Information Systems Department, School of Information Systems, Bina Nusantara University11480, Indonesia; Putri, A.S., Information Systems Department, School of Information Systems, Bina Nusantara University11480, Indonesia; Hiqna, S.S., Information Systems Department, School of Information Systems, Bina Nusantara University11480, Indonesia; Pratita, W., Information Systems Department, School of Information Systems, Bina Nusantara University11480, Indonesia
Abstract: Nowadays, as the Information and Technology rapidly growing all across the world, Indonesia as one of many developed countries always tries to keep up relating to this trend. Regarding to this situation, the use of Information and Technology in various fields are greatly enhanced, and not to mention businesses. There are a lot of businesses using technology, building a start-up is one of the common ways to combine technology with innovation. Intrapreneurship is a media to develop new venture within an organization and to exploit new opportunities. To help the continuity of intrapreneuship, there must be an Innovation Management that serves help to develop ideas from the internal employees and always find the best solution to help the intrapreneurs grows in the best environment. To make a better decision making, management need some tools to monitor and evaluate the Intrapreneurs. Data Dashboard aims to help the decision maker to see the Intrapreneurs’ performance and at once feel their pain and gain. With those insights that can be obtained from the dashboard, hopefully, management can get enough information to make the best decision regarding the continuity status of each Intrapreneurs. This research will provide the dashboard with some algorithm to show the recommendation data about the status of Intrapreneurs. © 2019 ASTES Publishers. All rights reserved.
Author Keywords: Dashboard; Data Visualization; Innovation Management; Intrapreneurship
